special_text:
Lands enter tapped.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
[-2]: Double the number of counters on another target permanent you control.
[-2]: Ajani deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of modified permanents you control. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
